Git Flash Talk

Start using Git now!

October 22, 2019

Where

Mint College, Ortigas East

When

Tuesday | October 22, 2019 | 2:00pm - 4:00pm

Speaker

John Imbong (IT/CS Program Head)

Overview

In this Flash Talk we discuss how you can get started with using Git in your personal projects. This is a brief walkthrough of the history feature of Git and the basic commands.

Program

  • What is Git?
  • How can it be used in development?
  • Staged and unstaged files
  • Branches
  • Installation
  • Basic Git Commands
